resources.string: Malampuzha Garden is a beautifully landscaped garden on the front side of the Malampuzha Dam. It is full of lush green lawns with well laid-out flower beds.
Fantasy Park is the first amusement park in Kerala. The attractions include 16D Cine Magic Ride, Planetarium, Dragon Coaster, Super Splash...
Dhoni hills in Palakkad is popular picnic spot with a small and beautiful waterfall. It takes a three hours trek from the base of the Dhoni hills to reach this reserve forest area.
Meenvallam Waterfalls is situated in Palakkad district. Originating from the Thuppanadu River - a part of Western Ghats, these falls drop step by step from a height of 5 to 45 metres.

Palakkad Fort also known as Tipu sultan\'s Fort is an old fort situated in the heart of Palakkad town of Kerala state, southern India. It was built by Haider Ali in 1766 ACE and remains one of the best preserved forts in Kerala.
Seetharkundu Viewpoint is situated at a distance of 8Kms from Nelliyampathy. One of the prime attractions here is the waterfall. A stream runs down from here to form a small lake.
Nelliyampathy (also spelled Nelliampathi) is a hill station 60 kilometres (37 mi) from Palakkad, state of Kerala, India. Nelliampathy is surrounded by tea and coffee plantations.
A jungle safari which will quench one’s desire to witness all important wildlife in the park. A 3 ½ hour jungle safari will reveal the inner secrets of Parambikulam to outside world.
